duties_responsibilities.duty: Travel within the territory to engage and support accounts, analyze sales data, and assess business needs.
Build and maintain trusting relationships with all call points, conduct product trainings, and drive sales efforts.
Service existing accounts, plan and conduct educational workshops, and assist with selling techniques.
Schedule and route monthly in-person account visits, track account activity, resolve customer issues, and prospect within the territory.
Re-engage former accounts, work with schools, represent the brand at trade shows, and achieve or exceed sales objectives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or Esthetician License preferred
